${modID}:PowerGrid.NAME: Power Grid
${modID}:PowerGrid.DESCRIPTION: Every time you Channel an orb, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:ZeroPoint.NAME: Zero Point
${modID}:ZeroPoint.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Channel a Frost, gain 1 Focus for this turn.

${modID}:DarkDischarge.NAME: Dark Discharge
${modID}:DarkDischarge.DESCRIPTION: Every time you receive unblocked damage, Channel 1 Lightning, then Channel 1 Dark.

${modID}:EnergyFlux.NAME: Energy Flux
${modID}:EnergyFlux.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Channel a Plasma if you have an empty orb slot.

${modID}:MagneticPulse.NAME: Magnetic Pulse
${modID}:MagneticPulse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy intends to attack, Channel a Frost.
${modID}:MagneticPulse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy intends to attack, Channel a Frost and gain !B! Block.

${modID}:Resonance.NAME: Resonance
${modID}:Resonance.DESCRIPTION: Every time an orb is Evoked, all other orbs deal 2 damage to a random enemy twice.
${modID}:Resonance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Every time an orb is Evoked, all other orbs deal 3 damage to a random enemy twice.

${modID}:QuantumLeech.NAME: Quantum Leech
${modID}:QuantumLeech.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. For every Dark Channeled, Heal !M!.
${modID}:QuantumLeech.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. For every Dark Channeled, Heal !M!.

${modID}:PlasmaChain.NAME: Plasma Chain
${modID}:PlasmaChain.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]  equal to !M! times your Plasma. For every Plasma, Channel 1 Lightning.
${modID}:PlasmaChain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]  equal to !M! times your Plasma. For every Plasma, Channel 1 Lightning.

${modID}:CircuitOverload.NAME: Circuit Overload
${modID}:CircuitOverload.DESCRIPTION: Deal 7 damage X times. Evoke your next Orb X times. Exhaust.
${modID}:CircuitOverload.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 7 damage X times. Evoke your next Orb X times. Gain 7 Block X times. Exhaust.

${modID}:EnergySink.NAME: Energy Sink
${modID}:EnergySink.DESCRIPTION: Consume all Plasma orbs. Gain [E] for each.
${modID}:EnergySink.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Consume all Plasma orbs. Gain [E] and 2 Focus for each.

${modID}:SynergyMatrix.NAME: Synergy Matrix
${modID}:SynergyMatrix.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, evoke the next Orb and Channel the leftmost Orb.

${modID}:OrbAmplifier.NAME: Orb Amplifier
${modID}:OrbAmplifier.DESCRIPTION: Gain Orb slots equal to the amount of Orbs currently Channeled.
${modID}:OrbAmplifier.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Orb slots equal to 2 plus the amount of Orbs currently Channeled.

${modID}:OrbitalResurgence.NAME: Orbital Resurgence
${modID}:OrbitalResurgence.DESCRIPTION: Evoke all Orbs. Channel the Evoked Orbs.
